sourcesContent:
import React,{ useEffect,useMemo, useState} from 'react' import { Table,Checkbox,Button} from 'semantic-ui-react'; import '../App.css' let count=0; const Fullinfo = { cAddress:'', description:'', amount:'', recipient:'', donors:'', voters:'', completed:'' } const ShowRequest=(props)=> { const[value,setValue]=useState([count]) const [reqValue,setReqValue] = useState(Fullinfo); const requestInfo=async()=>{ value.map(async(e) => { let info = await props.contract.methods.getRequeststatus(e).call(); setReqValue([...reqValue, { cAddress:info[6], description:info[5], amount:props.web3.utils.fromWei(info[1]), recipient:info[2], donors:info[4], voters:info[3], completed:info } ]) }) count++; setValue([...value,count]); } useEffect(()=>{ requestInfo(); },[props.refresh]) return (
{console.log("request value-",reqValue)} {console.log(props.contract)} Request_NO Creator Description: Amount: Recipient: Voters/Donors Payment Completed { reqValue.map((e,index)=>( {index} {e.cAddress} {e.description} {e.amount} {e.recipient} {e.voters}/{e.donors} {e.completed} )) } {/* {Requests.map((request,index) => ( {index} {cAddress} {description} {amount} {recipient} {voters}/{donors} {completed} ) )} */}
) } export default ShowRequest
